nodes.text: The Quesh Republic Orbital Station was a space station that orbited the planet Quesh during the Cold War and the subsequent renewed conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The Quesh Orbital Station for the Imperial faction was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as the spaceport for Imperial players for the planet Quesh, and can only be accessed by players with their own ship.
